title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Skills: Short-Term Language Proficiency Enhancement Course Based on Online Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate or higher language proficiency and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design team-based language projects in offline environments without online collaboration tools.
Learners improve the accuracy and creativity of language expressions by over 20% using a peer feedback system.
Learners apply asynchronous collaborative learning strategies to perform at least three iterative idea-development cycles.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
